movies.title: Aquaman
movies.sypnosis: Amphibious superhero Arthur Curry learns what it means to be Aquaman when he must stop the king of Atlantis from waging war against the surface world.

movies.title: Deadpool
movies.sypnosis: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

movies.title: Tomorrowland
movies.sypnosis: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.sypnosis: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

movies.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
movies.sypnosis: With mutants Apocalypse and Magneto intent on mankind's destruction, Professor X and his team of young X-Men must battle for the future of humanity.

movies.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
movies.sypnosis: Four high school students get sucked into the jungle setting of a video game, where they embark on a quest as their comically mismatched adult avatars.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
movies.sypnosis: After meeting an enchanted creature, Hiccup and Toothless set out to find a legendary dragon paradise before evil hunter Grimmel finds them first.

movies.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
movies.sypnosis: Enemies turn into frenemies when the Pigs call for a truce with the Birds to unite against a formidable new foe thatâ€™s threatening all of their homes.

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.sypnosis: Villainous Gru hatches a plan to steal the moon from the sky. But he has a tough time staying on task after three orphans land in his care.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.sypnosis: Peter Parker returns to routine life as a high schooler until the Vulture's arrival gives him the chance to prove himself as a web-slinging superhero.
